lines.text:
[preparing to duel with Sam]
En garde?
I'm ready!

[Sam starts taking his steps while Bugs counts]
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, nine and a half, nine and three quarters, nine and three sixteenths, eleven sixteenths, twelve sixteenths, ten!
[a bus runs over Sam]
Yep, he's right on time.

[lying dazed in the middle of the street]
Ooh... what a night.
That dame's taking everything but the kitchen sink.
[kitchen sink drops into Sam's arms]
[Bugs is disguised as a Frenchman]
Eh, what is up, M'sieur le physician?
You darn dude! I'll give you a taste of leather!
[Smacks Bugs across the face with his glove]
Ha! You have insult the great lover, the Marquis of Queensbury Rules! Take *this*!
[Slips a brick into his glove and hits Sam with it, the broken pieces falling out]
[Bugs, dressed as Granny, comes up to Yosemite Sam with a tray full of coffee supplies]
One or two lumps?
Make it two.
Two? Okay.
[Bugs takes a mallet and delivers two lumps to Sam's noggin with it]
One, two.
[He then runs off, giggling]

[Being chased by Yosemite Sam]
Land sake! Nothing like this has happened to me since the boys got back from Gettysburg!
[Giggles]
